original_title: Of Monks and Masters: Woes At The Winery
overview: When Tang Ye who defected from Gyeongseong and Heo Ji-bu of Changju are murdered, the Jeokpalbang and Shaolin Temple disciple Lee So-baek go to see Gui-yu, the best blacksmith in Moorim, using the wounds on the victim's neck and the broken consul's sword of Tang Ye as clues. The two people, who got a clue about the Yeonglong Lodge from Gui-yu, try to meet Yeonsip-sam, the owner of the Yeonglong Lodge, but he is already dead. However, Jeokpalbang, who noticed a strange look, digs up the tomb of Yeon-sam Yeong-sam, and the only thing that came out of his coffin was the sword of Yangui, the sword he loved... Can you uncover the conspiracy of a hidden organization?
title: Of Monks and Masters: Woes At The Winery
